ygData.subject: Re: Rubicite, Cazic Thule, and Verant's Biggest Mistake
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/17/99 7:18:48 AM Eastern Daylight Time, tigger@sinclair.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/17/99 7:18:48 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
tigger@... writes:

<< 8. Getting a reasonable amount of Rubicite would require sitting in Cazic
with a bunch of people who are constantly stressed about looting, and doing
this for a LONG time . . weeks or MONTHS.

9. Number 8 is not fun. >>

Amen , this is where i'm at now and although the exp is pretty good , its not
very fun , and can be very frustrating. ( but i do like working my way up
four corners to the archon , thats fun till we get swamped when we can't
control the spawn , hehe)

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 32 bard of tunare
Wonders when a good time to go to lower guk is ....
